AI Description: The tidyselect package in R provides a dialect of selection semantics tailored to work with the tidyverse. It allows users to select columns (variables) in a data frame using a human-readable syntax that reflects the structure of the data.
Core Features: Select Columns In Data Frames Using A Tidyverse-Friendly Syntax, Support For A Wide Range Of Selection Operations, Integration With Other Tidyverse Packages For Seamless Data Manipulation
General Tags: R, Data Wrangling, Data Manipulation, Tidyverse
